flawed_nl_solution:
Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=8>>8 cows.
This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 8 cows + 24 cows = <<8+24=32>>32 cows.
After he bought more cows he now has 32 cows + 43 cows = <<32+43=78>>78 cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has 78 cows + 8 cows = <<78+8=86>>86 cows.
#### 86

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 78. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
